thread.title: California may allow violent inmates to fight fires

title: California may allow violent inmates to fight fires
text:
Published By: CBS News: U.S. - Today 
The nation's oldest inmate firefighting unit is down in numbers, and the fires are getting worse, so they may take a radical step...
